00129 
00130 void
00131 L_change_beq_mcb(L_Cb *cb)
00132 {
00133 
00134     L_Oper *oper, *opB;
00135     L_Attr *attr = NULL;
00136 
00137     for (oper=cb->first_op; oper!=NULL; oper=oper->next_op) {
00138 
00139         if (oper->opc != Lop_BEQ) continue;
00140 
00141             /* backward search for a corresponding mov_new */
00142 
00143         for (opB=oper->prev_op; opB!=NULL; opB=opB->prev_op) {
00144 
00145             if (opB->opc != Lop_MOV) continue;
00146 
00147             if (L_find_attr(opB->attr,"SIMNOT") == NULL) continue;
00148 
00149             if (opB->dest[0]->value.r != oper->src[0]->value.r) continue;
00150             opB = opB->prev_op;
00151             if (L_is_reg(opB->dest[0])) {
00152                 attr = L_new_attr("MCB", 1);
00153                 L_set_int_attr_field(attr, 0, opB->dest[0]->value.r);
00154             }
00155             else if (L_is_macro(opB->dest[0])) {
00156                 attr = L_new_attr("MCB", 1);
00157                 L_set_int_attr_field(attr, 0, -opB->dest[0]->value.mac);
00158             }
00159             else
00160                 L_punt("L_change_beq_mcb: load dest is not reg or mac",
00161                         L_ERR_INTERNAL);
00162             attr->next_attr = oper->attr;
00163             oper->attr = attr;
00164             break;
00165         }
00166     }
00167 
00168 }

00171 
00172 static L_Oper *
00173 L_get_regs_load_def (L_Oper *oper, L_Operand *reg)
00174 {
00175     L_Oper *def;
00176 
00177     def = L_prev_def (reg,oper);
00178 
00179     if (def == NULL)
00180         return (NULL);
00181 
00182     if (L_general_load_opcode (def))
00183         return def;
00184     else
00185         return (NULL);
00186 
00187 }
00188

00190 
00191 static int
00192 L_are_same_pointer_regs(L_Oper *op1,L_Operand *reg1,L_Oper *op2,L_Operand *reg2)
00193 {
00194     L_Oper *load1, *load2;
00195 
00196         /* first find reg1's prev definition and see if load */
00197 
00198     load1 = L_get_regs_load_def (op1, reg1);
00199 
00200     if (load1 == NULL)
00201         return 0;
00202 
00203         /* then find reg2's prev definition and see if load */
00204 
00205     load2 = L_get_regs_load_def (op2, reg2);
00206 
00207     if (load2 == NULL)
00208         return 0;
00209 
00210         /* finally compare operands */
00211 
00212     if ( (load1->opc == load2->opc) &&
00213          (L_same_operand(load1->src[0],load2->src[0])) &&
00214          (L_same_operand(load1->src[1],load2->src[1])) ) 
00215 
00216         return 1;
00217 
00218     else
00219         return 0;
00220 
00221 }
00222 
00223 
00224 static int
00225 L_check_equivalent_regs(L_Oper *op1,L_Operand *reg1,L_Oper *op2,L_Operand *reg2)
00226 {
00227 
00228     return (L_are_same_pointer_regs(op1,reg1,op2,reg2));
00229 
00230 }

00233 
00234 int
00235 L_dependent_memory_ops (L_Cb *cb, L_Oper *op1, L_Oper *op2)
00236 {
00237 
00238     L_Operand *base1, *base2, *offset1, *offset2;
00239     L_Operand *src1, *src2;
00240     int size1, size2, dependent;
00241     int stack1, stack2;
00242 
00243     if (! (L_general_load_opcode(op1) || L_general_store_opcode(op1)))
00244         L_punt("L_independent_memory_ops: operand isn't memory ref",
00245                         L_ERR_INTERNAL);
00246     if (! (L_general_load_opcode(op2) || L_general_store_opcode(op2)))
00247         L_punt("L_independent_memory_ops: operand isn't memory ref",
00248                         L_ERR_INTERNAL);
00249 
00250     src1 = op1->src[0];
00251     src2 = op1->src[1];
00252     if ( (L_is_macro(src2) &&
00253          ((src2->value.mac==L_MAC_SP)||(src2->value.mac==L_MAC_FP))) ||
00254           L_is_label(src2) || L_is_int_constant(src1) )  {
00255         base1 = src2;
00256         offset1 = src1;
00257     }
00258     else {
00259         base1 = src1;
00260         offset1 = src2;
00261     }
00262 
00263     src1 = op2->src[0];
00264     src2 = op2->src[1];
00265     if ( (L_is_macro(src2) &&
00266          ((src2->value.mac==L_MAC_SP)||(src2->value.mac==L_MAC_FP))) ||
00267           L_is_label(src2) || L_is_int_constant(src1) )  {
00268         base2 = src2;
00269         offset2 = src1;
00270     }
00271     else {
00272         base2 = src1;
00273         offset2 = src2;
00274     }
00275 
00276     size1 = L_memory_access_size(op1);
00277     size2 = L_memory_access_size(op2);
00278 
00279     stack1 = stack2 = 0;
00280     if (M_is_stack_operand(base1))
00281         stack1 = 1;
00282     if (M_is_stack_operand(base2))
00283         stack2 = 1;
00284 
00285     dependent = 0;
00286 
00287     /* Case 2 (cases refer to corresponding case in L_independent_memory_ops) */
00288 
00289     if (stack1 & stack2) {
00290         if ( L_same_operand(base1, base2)) {
00291             if (! L_is_int_constant(offset1))
00292                 dependent = 0;
00293             else if (! L_is_int_constant(offset2))
00294                 dependent = 0;
00295             else {
00296                 dependent = ! L_no_overlap(offset1->value.i, size1,
00297                                            offset2->value.i, size2);
00298             }
00299         }
00300     }
00301 
00302     /* Case 4 */
00303 
00304     else if ((L_is_label(base1)) && (L_is_label(base2))) {
00305         if ( ! strcmp(base1->value.l, base2->value.l)) {
00306             if (! L_is_int_constant(offset1))
00307                 dependent = 0;
00308             else if (! L_is_int_constant(offset2))
00309                 dependent = 0;
00310             else {
00311                 dependent = ! L_no_overlap(offset1->value.i, size1,
00312                                            offset2->value.i, size2);
00313             }
00314         }
00315     }
00316 
00317     /* Case 7 */
00318 
00319     else if ((L_is_reg(base1)) && (L_is_reg(base2))) {
00320         if (base1->value.r!=base2->value.r)
00321             dependent = 0;
00322         else if ( (L_is_reg(offset1)) &&
00323                   (L_is_reg(offset2))) {
00324             if (offset1->value.r==offset2->value.r)
00325                 dependent = 1;
00326             else
00327                 dependent = 0;
00328         }
00329         else if (! L_is_int_constant(offset1))
00330             dependent = 0;
00331         else if (! L_is_int_constant(offset2))
00332             dependent = 0;
00333         /* T_same_def_reachs is only a local opti predicate ops must be
00334          * in same basic block to resolve this case
00335          */
00336         else if (! L_in_same_block(op1, op2))
00337             dependent = 0;
00338         else if (! L_same_def_reachs(base1, op1, op2))
00339             dependent = 0;
00340         else
00341             dependent = ! L_no_overlap(offset1->value.i, size1,
00342                                        offset2->value.i, size2);
00343 
00344         if (!dependent) {
00345 
00346             if ( (L_is_int_constant(offset1)) &&
00347                  (L_is_int_constant(offset2)) &&
00348                  (offset1->value.i == offset2->value.i) ) {
00349                 dependent = L_check_equivalent_regs (op1,base1,op2,base2);
00350 
00351             }
00352         }
00353 
00354 
00355     }
00356 
00357     return (dependent);
00358 }

00362 
00363 L_Cb *
00364 L_copy_all_oper_in_cb (L_Func *fn, L_Cb *cb)
00365 {
00366     L_Oper *oper, *new_oper;
00367     L_Cb *new_cb;
00368 
00369     new_cb = L_new_cb (++(L_fn->max_cb_id));
00370     new_cb->weight = cb->weight;
00371 
00372     for (oper=cb->first_op; oper!=NULL; oper=oper->next_op) {
00373         new_oper = L_copy_operation(oper);
00374         L_insert_oper_after(new_cb, new_cb->last_op, new_oper);
00375         L_oper_hash_tbl_delete(fn->oper_hash_tbl, new_oper);
00376         new_oper->id = oper->id;
00377     }
00378 
00379     new_cb->src_flow = cb->src_flow;
00380     new_cb->dest_flow = cb->dest_flow;
00381     return (new_cb);
00382 }
00383 
00384 void
00385 L_remove_sched_cb (L_Func *fn, L_Cb *cb)
00386 {
00387     L_Oper *oper;
00388     L_Oper_List *list, *next_list;
00389 
00390     for (oper=cb->first_op; oper != NULL; oper = oper->next_op) {
00391 
00392         if (oper->ext != NULL) {
00393             L_delete_ru_info_oper(SCHED_INFO(oper)->ru_info);
00394 
00395             L_free(Operand_ready_pool, SCHED_INFO(oper)->operand_ready_times);
00396 
00397             list = SCHED_INFO(oper)->store_list;
00398             while (list != NULL) {
00399                 next_list = list->next_list;
00400                 list->next_list = NULL;
00401                 list->oper = NULL;
00402                 L_free (Lmcb_list_pool,list);
00403                 list = next_list;
00404             }
00405 
00406             L_free(Sched_Info_pool, oper->ext);
00407             oper->ext = NULL;
00408         }
00409     }
00410     L_delete_cb (fn,cb);
00411 }

00418 
00419 }

00454 static void
00455 L_free_oper_list_cb( L_Cb *cb)
00456 {
00457     L_Oper *oper;
00458     L_Oper_List *list;
00459 
00460     for (oper = cb->first_op; oper != NULL; oper = oper->next_op) {
00461 
00462         if (SCHED_INFO(oper) == NULL)
00463             continue;
00464 
00465         list = SCHED_INFO(oper)->store_list;
00466 
00467         if (list != NULL)
00468             L_delete_all_oper_list (list);
00469     }
00470 }

00473 static void
00474 L_mcb_add_store_to_load_list(L_Oper *store, L_Oper *load)
00475 {
00476     L_Oper_List *new_store;
00477 
00478     new_store = L_new_oper_list();
00479     new_store->oper = store;
00480 
00481         /* add to load's store_list */
00482     new_store->next_list = SCHED_INFO(load)->store_list;
00483     SCHED_INFO(load)->store_list = new_store;
00484 
00485 }

00494 static int
00495 L_is_mem_or_flow_dep(L_Dep *depend)
00496 {
00497     switch (depend->type) {
00498 
00499         case L_DEP_MEM_FLOW:
00500         case L_DEP_MEM_ANTI:
00501         case L_DEP_MEM_OUTPUT:
00502         case L_DEP_CNT:
00503             return (1);
00504             break;
00505         default:
00506             return (0);
00507     }
00508 }
00509 
00510 
00511 static L_Oper *
00512 L_mcb_insert_check (L_Oper *oper)
00513 {
00514     L_Oper *check_oper, *prev_br, *post_br;
00515     Sched_Info *sched_info;
00516     L_Dep *input, *output;
00517     int from, to, distance, home_block, old_num_dep;
00518 
00519         /* this function is responsible for creating a new check
00520            instruction, which inherits all dependences from the incoming
00521            load oper.  A register flow dependence is added from the load to
00522            the check */
00523 
00524     home_block = SCHED_INFO(oper)->home_block;
00525     prev_br = SCHED_INFO(oper)->prev_br;
00526     post_br = SCHED_INFO(oper)->post_br;
00527 
00528     check_oper = L_create_new_op_using (Lop_CHECK,oper->parent_op);
00529     check_oper->src[0] = L_copy_operand (oper->dest[0]);
00530         /* don't want to allocate a cb to src 1 yet */
00531     check_oper->src[1] = NULL;
00532 
00533     check_oper->dep_info = (void *) L_new_dep_info();
00534     check_oper->weight = oper->weight;
00535 
00536     L_build_oper_mdes_info (check_oper);
00537 
00538 
00539         /* give check_oper all of oper's dependences */
00540 
00541     for (input = DEP_INFO(oper)->input_dep;input!=NULL;input=input->next_dep)
00542         L_add_dep (input->type,input->distance,input->from_index,
00543                    input->to_index, input->from_oper, check_oper, 0);
00544 
00545    for (output=DEP_INFO(oper)->output_dep;output!=NULL;output=output->next_dep){
00546 
00547         if (L_is_mem_or_flow_dep(output)) {
00548 
00549             L_add_dep (output->type, 0,output->from_index,
00550                        output->to_index, check_oper, output->to_oper, 0);
00551             SCHED_INFO(output->to_oper)->num_depend++;
00552 
00553         }
00554 
00555     }
00556 
00557 
00558         /* add reg_flow dependence from oper to check_oper */  
00559     from = operand_index(MDES_DEST,0);
00560     to = operand_index(MDES_SRC,0);
00561 /*
00562     distance = max_operand_time(MDES_INFO(oper), from) -
00563                min_operand_time(MDES_INFO(check_oper), to);
00564     if (distance < 0)
00565         distance = 0;
00566 */
00567 
00568     L_add_dep (L_DEP_REG_FLOW, 0, from,to,oper,check_oper, 0);
00569     {
00570         Dep_Info *ch_dep,*ld_dep;
00571         ch_dep = DEP_INFO(check_oper);
00572         ld_dep = DEP_INFO(oper);
00573     }
00574 
00575         /* add cnt_flow dependence to prev branch */
00576 
00577     if ((prev_br = SCHED_INFO(oper)->prev_br) != NULL) {
00578         from = operand_index(MDES_SYNC_OUT, DEP_CNT_OPERAND);
00579         to = operand_index(MDES_SYNC_IN, DEP_CNT_OPERAND);
00580         distance = (max_operand_time(MDES_INFO(prev_br), from)) -
00581                    (min_operand_time(MDES_INFO(check_oper), to));
00582         if (distance < 0)
00583             distance = 0;
00584         L_add_dep (L_DEP_CNT, distance, from,to,prev_br,check_oper, 0);
00585     }
00586 
00587         /* add cnt_flow dependence to next branch */
00588 
00589     if ((post_br = SCHED_INFO(oper)->post_br) != NULL) {
00590         from = operand_index(MDES_SYNC_OUT, DEP_CNT_OPERAND);
00591         to = operand_index(MDES_SYNC_IN, DEP_CNT_OPERAND);
00592         distance = 0;
00593         old_num_dep = DEP_INFO(post_br)->n_input_dep;
00594         L_add_dep (L_DEP_CNT, distance, from,to,check_oper,post_br, 0);
00595         if (DEP_INFO(post_br)->n_input_dep > old_num_dep)
00596             SCHED_INFO(post_br)->num_depend++;
00597     }
00598 
00599     check_oper->ext = (Sched_Info *)
00600         L_create_sched_info(check_oper, home_block, prev_br, post_br);
00601 
00602     sched_info = SCHED_INFO(check_oper);
00603 
00604     return (check_oper);
00605 }
00606 
00607 
00608 static void
00609 L_add_check_to_check_dep (L_Oper *prev_check, L_Oper *check)
00610 {
00611     int from, to, distance;
00612 
00613     if (prev_check == NULL)
00614         return;
00615 
00616     from = operand_index(MDES_SYNC_OUT, DEP_CNT_OPERAND);
00617     to = operand_index(MDES_SYNC_IN, DEP_CNT_OPERAND);
00618     distance = 0;
00619   
00620     L_add_dep (L_DEP_CNT, distance, from,to,prev_check,check, 0);
00621 
00622     SCHED_INFO(check)->num_depend++;
00623 
00624 }
00625 
00626 
00627 
00628 void 
00629 L_mcb_insert_check_and_rem_dependences (L_Cb *cb)
00630 {
00631     L_Oper *oper, *check_oper, *opB, *prev_check, *prev_op;
00632     Dep_Info *dinfo;
00633     int check_added;
00634     int store_count;
00635     int dep_flags = SET_NONLOOP_CARRIED(0);
00636     
00637     prev_check = NULL;
00638 
00639         /* this function is responsible for inserting check instructions
00640            and removing load/store dependences.  All loads in the cb will
00641            automatically have a check added following it, which inherits
00642            all dependences of load, plus a dependence on the load.  The
00643            function will then remove load/store dependences for all stores
00644            ahead of the load in the current schedule. */
00645 
00646     for (oper = cb->first_op; oper != NULL; oper = oper->next_op) {
00647         if (L_general_load_opcode(oper)) {
00648             check_added = 0;
00649             store_count = 0;
00650                 /* remove load/store dep */ 
00651             for (opB = oper->prev_op; opB != NULL; opB = prev_op) {
00652                 prev_op = opB->prev_op;
00653                 if (L_general_store_opcode(opB)) {
00654                         /* exit loop once have bypassed max # of stores */
00655                     store_count++;
00656                     if (store_count > MAX_STORES_BYPASSED)
00657                         prev_op = NULL;
00658                     if ( (!L_dependent_memory_ops (cb, opB, oper) ) &&
00659                          (!L_independent_memory_ops (cb,opB,oper,dep_flags))) {
00660 
00661                         if (! check_added ) {
00662 
00663                             check_oper = L_mcb_insert_check (oper);
00664                             L_insert_oper_after(cb,oper,check_oper);
00665                             L_add_check_ptr_to_oper (check_oper,oper);
00666 
00667                             check_added = 1;
00668                         }
00669 
00670                         L_mcb_add_store_to_load_list(opB,oper);
00671 
00672                         if ((dinfo = DEP_INFO(oper)) != NULL) {
00673                             dinfo->input_dep =
00674                                 L_remove_dep(dinfo->input_dep,
00675                                              &dinfo->n_input_dep,
00676                                              L_DEP_MEM_FLOW, opB, oper);
00677                             SCHED_INFO(oper)->num_depend--;
00678                         }
00679                         if ((dinfo = DEP_INFO(opB)) != NULL) {
00680                             dinfo->output_dep =
00681                                 L_remove_dep(dinfo->output_dep,
00682                                              &dinfo->n_output_dep,
00683                                              L_DEP_MEM_FLOW, opB, oper);
00684                         }
00685                     }
00686                 }
00687             }
00688         }
00689     }
00690 
00691         /*to prevent checks from reordering, we add check-check dependence; this
00692            is necessary to prevent a Ld R1, Ld R2, Ch R2, Ch R1 sequence. */
00693 
00694     for (oper = cb->first_op; oper != NULL; oper = oper->next_op) {
00695         if (oper->opc == Lop_CHECK) {
00696             L_add_check_to_check_dep (prev_check, oper);
00697             prev_check = oper;
00698         }
00699     }
00700 /*
00701     L_print_dependence_graph (stdout, cb);
00702 */
00703 }
00704 
00705 
00706 #if 0
00707 #ifndef OPENIMPACT_DISTRIBUTION
00708 static int
00709 Lhppa_mcb_branch_opcode(int opc, int ext, int dir)
00710 {
00711     int hp_op;
00712 
00713     switch (opc)  {
00714         case Lop_BEQ_FS: case Lop_BEQ:
00715             hp_op = LHPPAop_COMB_EQ_FWD;
00716             break;
00717         case Lop_BNE_FS: case Lop_BNE:
00718             hp_op = LHPPAop_COMB_NE_FWD;
00719             break;
00720         case Lop_BGT_FS: case Lop_BGT:
00721             hp_op = LHPPAop_COMB_GT_FWD;
00722             break;
00723         case Lop_BGE_FS: case Lop_BGE:
00724             hp_op = LHPPAop_COMB_GE_FWD;
00725             break;
00726         case Lop_BLT_FS: case Lop_BLT:
00727             hp_op = LHPPAop_COMB_LT_FWD;
00728             break;
00729         case Lop_BLE_FS: case Lop_BLE:
00730             hp_op = LHPPAop_COMB_LE_FWD;
00731             break;
00732         case Lop_BGT_U_FS: case Lop_BGT_U:
00733             hp_op = LHPPAop_COMB_GT_U_FWD;
00734             break;
00735         case Lop_BGE_U_FS: case Lop_BGE_U:
00736             hp_op = LHPPAop_COMB_GE_U_FWD;
00737             break;
00738         case Lop_BLT_U_FS: case Lop_BLT_U:
00739             hp_op = LHPPAop_COMB_LT_U_FWD;
00740             break;
00741         case Lop_BLE_U_FS: case Lop_BLE_U:
00742             hp_op = LHPPAop_COMB_LE_U_FWD;
00743             break;
00744     }
00745     if ( ext )
00746         /* comparison with immediate operand */
00747         hp_op += 10;
00748     if ( dir == CBR_BACKWARD_EXT )
00749         hp_op += 20;
00750 
00751     return(hp_op);
00752 
00753 
00754 
00755 }
00756 #endif
00757 #endif

00761 static void
00762 L_add_beq_proc_opc(L_Oper *oper)
00763 {
00764     int ext;
00765

00767

00781 static void
00782 L_mcb_convert_sched_info(L_Oper *new_oper, L_Oper *old_oper)
00783 {
00784     Sched_Info *sched_info;
00785 
00786     sched_info = (Sched_Info *) new_oper->ext;
00787 
00788     sched_info->oper = new_oper;
00789     sched_info->id = new_oper->id;
00790     sched_info->proc_opc = new_oper->proc_opc;
00791     sched_info->dep_info = new_oper->dep_info;
00792     sched_info->mdes_info = new_oper->mdes_info;
00793 }

00797 static int
00798 L_is_corr_cb(L_Cb *cb)
00799 {
00800     if (L_find_attr(cb->attr,"MCB_CORR_CB") == NULL)
00801         return 0;
00802 
00803     return 1;
00804 }
00805 
00806 
00807 static void
00808 L_insert_correction_code(L_Cb *cb)
00809 {
00810     L_Cb *new_cb, *correction_cb, *corr_cb;
00811     L_Oper *oper, *opB;
00812     int dest;
00813     L_Attr *attr, *corr_attr;
00814     int new_dest, src;
00815 
00816     for (oper=cb->first_op;oper!=NULL;oper=oper->next_op) {
00817 
00818         if (L_general_load_opcode(oper)) {
00819             if (SCHED_INFO(oper)->check_op) {
00820                 L_Oper *new_oper;
00821                 int flow_count;
00822 
00823                 oper->attr = L_concat_attr (oper->attr, L_new_attr("MCB",0));
00824 
00825                     /* DMG - add data spec flag */
00826                 oper->flags = L_SET_BIT_FLAG (oper->flags, L_OPER_DATA_SPECULATIVE);
00827                 flow_count = 0;
00828 
00829                 opB = SCHED_INFO(oper)->check_op;
00830 
00831                 if (opB->opc != Lop_CHECK)
00832                     L_punt ("L_insert_correction_code: check inst not found");
00833 
00834                     /* Change check oper into BEQ */
00835 
00836                 new_oper = L_create_new_op(Lop_BEQ);
00837                 new_oper->src[1] = L_copy_operand(opB->src[0]);
00838                 new_oper->src[0] = L_new_gen_int_operand(1);
00839                 correction_cb = L_create_cb(0.0);
00840                 correction_cb->attr = L_concat_attr (correction_cb->attr,
00841                         L_new_attr("MCB_CORR_CB",0));
00842                 new_oper->src[2] = L_new_cb_operand(correction_cb);
00843 
00844                 if (L_is_reg(opB->src[0])) {
00845                     new_oper->attr = L_new_attr("MCB", 1);
00846                     L_set_int_attr_field(new_oper->attr, 0, 
00847                                         opB->src[0]->value.r);
00848                 }
00849                 else if (L_is_macro(opB->src[0])) {
00850                     new_oper->attr = L_new_attr("MCB", 1);
00851                     L_set_int_attr_field(new_oper->attr, 0, 
00852                                         -opB->src[0]->value.mac);
00853                 }
00854                 else
00855                     L_punt("L_insert_correction_code: check reg not reg/mac");
00856 
00857                 attr = L_new_attr("check",1);
00858                 L_set_int_attr_field(attr, 0, oper->id);
00859                 new_oper->attr = L_concat_attr (new_oper->attr, attr);
00860 
00861 #if 0
00862 #ifndef OPENIMPACT_DISTRIBUTION
00863                 L_add_beq_proc_opc(new_oper);
00864 #endif
00865 #endif
00866                 L_insert_oper_after(cb, opB,new_oper);
00867 
00868                 SCHED_INFO(oper)->check_op = new_oper;
00869                 new_oper->ext = opB->ext;
00870                 L_mcb_convert_sched_info(new_oper, opB);
00871                 opB->ext = NULL;
00872                 L_delete_oper(cb,opB);
00873 
00874                 for (opB=new_oper->prev_op; opB!=NULL; opB=opB->prev_op) {
00875                     if (L_general_branch_opcode(opB)) flow_count++;
00876                 }
00877                 if (flow_count == 0) {
00878                     L_Flow *new_flow = L_new_flow(1,cb,correction_cb,0.0);
00879                     new_flow->next_flow = cb->dest_flow;
00880                     cb->dest_flow = new_flow;
00881                 } else {
00882                     int n;
00883                     L_Flow *new_flow = L_new_flow(1,cb,correction_cb,0.0);
00884                     L_Flow *flow = cb->dest_flow;
00885                     for (n=0; n<(flow_count-1); n++) flow = flow->next_flow;
00886                     new_flow->next_flow = flow->next_flow;
00887                     flow->next_flow =  new_flow;
00888                     /* copy the flow arcs to correction cb */
00889                 }
00890 
00891                 /*
00892                  * insertion of correction code
00893                  * first mark flow dependent operations
00894                  */
00895                 for (opB=oper->next_op;
00896                         (opB != NULL) && (opB!=SCHED_INFO(oper)->check_op);
00897                          opB=opB->next_op) 
00898                     opB->ambig_info = NULL;
00899 
00900                 new_oper = L_copy_operation (oper);
00901 
00902                 attr = L_new_attr("corr",1);
00903                 L_set_int_attr_field(attr, 0, oper->id);
00904                 new_oper->attr = L_concat_attr (new_oper->attr, attr);
00905 
00906                 oper->ambig_info = new_oper;
00907 
00908                 for (dest = 0; dest < L_max_dest_operand; dest++){
00909                     if (oper->dest[dest] != NULL) {
00910                         new_dest = L_get_reg_num (oper->dest[dest]);
00911                         L_check_flow_op(new_dest,oper,
00912                                         (SCHED_INFO(oper)->check_op));
00913                     }
00914                 }
00915 
00916                      /* and then find anti dependent ops to insert a move */
00917 
00918                 for (opB=oper;opB!=SCHED_INFO(oper)->check_op;opB=opB->next_op){
00919 
00920                     if (opB->ambig_info != NULL) {
00921                         for (src = 0; src < L_max_src_operand; src++)
00922                             if (opB->src[src] != NULL)
00923                                 L_rename_src_reg(cb,src,
00924                                                 opB,SCHED_INFO(oper)->check_op);
00925                     }
00926                 }
00927 
00928                 /* now copy the ops in the correction cb */
00929 
00930                 for (opB=oper;opB!=SCHED_INFO(oper)->check_op;opB=opB->next_op){
00931 
00932                     L_Attr *mcb_attr;
00933 
00934                     if (opB->ambig_info != NULL) { 
00935                         new_oper = opB->ambig_info;
00936                         if (opB == oper) {
00937                             mcb_attr = L_find_attr (new_oper->attr,"MCB");
00938                             if (mcb_attr != NULL)
00939                                 new_oper->attr = 
00940                                     L_delete_attr(new_oper->attr,mcb_attr);
00941                         }
00942                         L_insert_oper_after(correction_cb,
00943                                 correction_cb->last_op,new_oper);
00944                         oper->ambig_info = NULL;
00945                     }
00946                 }
00947 
00948                 L_insert_cb_after (L_fn, L_fn->last_cb, correction_cb);
00949 
00950                     /* the load could have been placed in some prev
00951                         correction cb, prior to having its MCB attr 
00952                         marked.  We need to search previous corr cbs
00953                         and see if the current load is in them */
00954 
00955                 for (corr_cb = correction_cb->prev_cb; L_is_corr_cb(corr_cb);
00956                         corr_cb=corr_cb->prev_cb)  {
00957 
00958                     for (opB=corr_cb->first_op; opB!=NULL;opB=opB->next_op) {
00959 
00960                         corr_attr = L_find_attr(opB->attr,"corr");
00961                         if (corr_attr && 
00962                             (corr_attr->field[0]->value.i == oper->id) ) {
00963 
00964                             opB->attr = L_concat_attr(opB->attr,
00965                                             L_new_attr("MCB",0));
00966                         }
00967                     }
00968                 }
00969 
00970                     /* we make the correction_cb + 1 as the place 
00971                         to go back to */
00972 
00973                 new_cb = L_create_cb(0.0);
00974                 new_cb->attr = L_concat_attr (new_cb->attr,
00975                         L_new_attr("MCB_CORR_CB",0));
00976 
00977                 correction_cb->dest_flow = 
00978                     L_new_flow(1,correction_cb,new_cb,0.0);
00979 
00980                 new_oper = L_create_new_op(Lop_JUMP);
00981                 new_oper->src[0] = L_new_cb_operand(new_cb);
00982                 attr = L_new_attr("MCB",0);
00983                 new_oper->attr = attr;
00984                 L_insert_oper_after(correction_cb,
00985                                     correction_cb->last_op,new_oper);
00986             }
00987         }
00988     }
00989 }
00990 
00991 
00992 
00993 static void
00994 L_insert_fall_thru_code(L_Cb *cb)
00995 {
00996 
00997     L_Oper *oper, *opB, *new_oper;
00998     int mark;
00999     L_Cb *first_linear_cb;
01000     L_Cb *dest_cb, *fall_cb = NULL;
01001     L_Attr *attr;
01002 
01003     mark = 0;
01004 
01005     L_color_cb(cb);
01006 
01007     for (oper=cb->first_op; oper!=NULL; oper=oper->next_op) {
01008 
01009         if ( (oper->opc == Lop_BEQ) &&
01010              (L_find_attr(oper->attr, "MCB") != NULL)) {
01011 
01012                 /* we want the correction cb's # plus 1 */
01013 
01014             dest_cb = oper->src[2]->value.cb;
01015             fall_cb = dest_cb->dest_flow->dst_cb;
01016 
01017             if (mark == 0) first_linear_cb = fall_cb;
01018 
01019             mark = 1;
01020 
01021             L_insert_cb_after (L_fn, L_fn->last_cb, fall_cb);
01022 
01023             for (opB=oper->next_op; opB!=NULL; opB=opB->next_op) {
01024 
01025                 L_Flow *flow_list = NULL;
01026                 new_oper = L_copy_operation(opB);
01027                 if (L_find_attr(new_oper->attr,"MCB") != NULL) {
01028                     attr = L_new_attr("corr",1);
01029                     L_set_int_attr_field(attr, 0, opB->id);
01030                     new_oper->attr = L_concat_attr (new_oper->attr, attr);
01031                 }
01032                 L_insert_oper_after(fall_cb,fall_cb->last_op, new_oper);
01033 
01034                 if (L_general_branch_opcode(opB)) {
01035 
01036                     L_Flow *flow; 
01037                     L_Flow *cp_flow; 
01038 
01039                     flow = L_cnt_flow[L_find_control_op_index(opB)];
01040                     cp_flow = L_new_flow(flow->cc, 
01041                                          fall_cb, flow->dst_cb, 0.0);
01042 
01043                     if (fall_cb->dest_flow == NULL) 
01044                         fall_cb->dest_flow = cp_flow;
01045 
01046                     else 
01047                         flow_list->next_flow = cp_flow;
01048 
01049                     flow_list = cp_flow;
01050                 }
01051 
01052                 if ((opB->opc == Lop_BEQ) &&
01053                     (L_find_attr(opB->attr, "MCB") != NULL)) {
01054 
01055 
01056                     if (opB != cb->last_op) {
01057                         L_Flow *flow;
01058                         L_Cb *dest_cb, *new_fall_cb;
01059 
01060                         dest_cb = opB->src[2]->value.cb;
01061                         new_fall_cb = dest_cb->dest_flow->dst_cb;
01062 
01063                         flow = L_new_flow(0,fall_cb,new_fall_cb,0.0);
01064 
01065                         if (fall_cb->dest_flow == NULL) {
01066                             fall_cb->dest_flow = flow;
01067                         } else {
01068                             flow_list->next_flow = flow;
01069                         }
01070                     }
01071                     oper = opB->prev_op;
01072                     break;
01073                 }
01074             }
01075         }
01076     }
01077     if (mark) {
01078         if (!(L_uncond_branch_opcode(cb->last_op) ||
01079             L_register_branch_opcode(cb->last_op))) {
01080 
01081             L_Flow *flow, *tmp;
01082 
01083             oper = L_create_new_op(Lop_JUMP);
01084             oper->src[0] = L_new_cb_operand(cb->next_cb);
01085 
01086             L_insert_oper_after(fall_cb, fall_cb->last_op,oper);
01087 
01088             flow = L_new_flow(0,fall_cb,cb->next_cb,0.0);
01089 
01090             if (fall_cb->dest_flow == NULL) {
01091                 fall_cb->dest_flow = flow;
01092             } 
01093             else {
01094                 for (tmp=fall_cb->dest_flow;tmp->next_flow!=NULL;
01095                         tmp=tmp->next_flow);
01096                 tmp->next_flow = flow;
01097             }
01098         }
01099     }
01100 }
01101 
01102 static void
01103 L_check_flow_op(int dest_reg, L_Oper *begin_op, L_Oper *end_op)
01104 {
01105     int new_dest;
01106     L_Oper *oper, *new_oper;
01107     L_Attr *attr;
01108     int src, dest, dependent;
01109 
01110     if (dest_reg == 0) return;
01111 
01112     for (oper=begin_op->next_op; oper!=end_op; oper=oper->next_op) {
01113 
01114         dependent = 0;
01115 
01116         for (src = 0; src < L_max_src_operand; src++) {
01117             if (oper->src[src] != NULL) 
01118                 if (dest_reg == L_get_reg_num (oper->src[src]) )
01119                     dependent = 1;
01120         }
01121 
01122         if (dependent) {
01123             if (oper->ambig_info == NULL) {
01124                 new_oper = L_copy_operation (oper);
01125                 attr = L_new_attr("corr",1);
01126                 L_set_int_attr_field(attr, 0, oper->id);
01127                 new_oper->attr = L_concat_attr (new_oper->attr, attr);
01128                 oper->ambig_info = new_oper;
01129             }
01130             for (dest = 0; dest < L_max_dest_operand; dest++) 
01131                 if (oper->dest[dest] != NULL) {
01132                     new_dest = L_get_reg_num (oper->dest[dest]);
01133                     L_check_flow_op(new_dest,oper,end_op);
01134                 }
01135             oper->flags = L_SET_BIT_FLAG(oper->flags,L_OPER_DATA_SPECULATIVE);
01136         }
01137 
01138             /* if the dest_reg is overwritten, no more opers are
01139                dependent upon the previous definition of this register;
01140                so return  */
01141 
01142         for (dest = 0; dest < L_max_dest_operand; dest++) {
01143             if (oper->dest[dest] != NULL) 
01144                 if (dest_reg == L_get_reg_num (oper->dest[dest]) )
01145                     return;
01146         }
01147     }
01148 }
01149 
01150 
01151 /*
01152  * return negative number for macro
01153  * return positive number for register
01154  * return 0 for other
01155  */
01156 
01157 static int 
01158 L_get_reg_num(L_Operand *operand)
01159 {
01160     switch(L_operand_case_type(operand)) {
01161     case L_OPERAND_MACRO:
01162         return(-(operand->value.mac));
01163         break;
01164     case L_OPERAND_REGISTER:
01165         if (operand->value.r == 0)
01166             L_punt("All register numbers should be > 0",-1);
01167         return(operand->value.r);
01168         break;
01169     default:
01170         return(0);
01171     }
01172 }
01173 
01174 
01175 
01176 static void
01177 L_rename_src_reg(L_Cb *cb, int operand_num, L_Oper *oper, L_Oper *end_op)
01178 {
01179     int dest, dest_reg, src_reg;
01180     L_Oper *op;
01181     L_Operand *operand;
01182 
01183     operand = oper->src[operand_num];
01184 
01185     if (!L_is_reg(operand))
01186         return;
01187 
01188     src_reg = L_get_reg_num(operand);
01189 
01190     if (src_reg != 0) {
01191 
01192         for (op=oper->next_op; op!=end_op; op=op->next_op) {
01193 
01194             for (dest = 0; dest < L_max_dest_operand; dest++) {
01195 
01196                 if (op->dest[dest] != NULL) {
01197 
01198                     dest_reg = L_get_reg_num(op->dest[dest]);
01199 
01200                     if (dest_reg == src_reg) {
01201 
01202                         L_Oper *prev_op = op->prev_op;
01203 
01204                             /* check if this reg has previously been renamed*/
01205 
01206                         if (prev_op->opc == Lop_MOV) {
01207 
01208                             int reg_num = L_get_reg_num(prev_op->src[0]);
01209 
01210                             if (reg_num != dest_reg) {
01211 
01212                                 L_Oper *new_oper = L_create_new_op(Lop_MOV);
01213                                 int new_tmp_reg = ++L_fn->max_reg_id;
01214 
01215                                 new_oper->dest[0] = 
01216                                     L_new_register_operand(new_tmp_reg,
01217                                        L_return_old_ctype(op->dest[dest]),L_PTYPE_NULL);
01218                                 new_oper->src[0] = 
01219                                     L_new_register_operand(dest_reg,
01220                                        L_return_old_ctype(op->dest[dest]),L_PTYPE_NULL);
01221 
01222                                 L_insert_oper_before(cb,op,new_oper);
01223 
01224                                 L_change_ext_operand (oper,operand_num,
01225                                           L_copy_operand (new_oper->dest[0]));
01226                             } 
01227                             else {
01228                                 L_change_ext_operand (oper,operand_num,
01229                                           L_copy_operand (prev_op->dest[0]));
01230                             }
01231                         } 
01232                         else {
01233                             L_Oper *new_oper = L_create_new_op(Lop_MOV);
01234                             int new_tmp_reg = ++L_fn->max_reg_id;
01235     
01236                             new_oper->dest[0] = 
01237                                 L_new_register_operand(new_tmp_reg,
01238                                            L_return_old_ctype(op->dest[dest]),L_PTYPE_NULL);
01239                             new_oper->src[0] = 
01240                                 L_new_register_operand(dest_reg,
01241                                            L_return_old_ctype(op->dest[dest]),L_PTYPE_NULL);
01242                             L_insert_oper_before(cb,op,new_oper);
01243 
01244                             L_change_ext_operand (oper,operand_num,
01245                                       L_copy_operand (new_oper->dest[0]));
01246                         }
01247                     }
01248                 }
01249             }
01250         }
01251     }
01252 }
01253 
01254 
01255 
01256 static void
01257 L_change_ext_operand (L_Oper *oper, int operand_num, L_Operand *new_operand)
01258 {
01259     L_Oper *corr_oper;
01260     L_Operand *old_operand;
01261 
01262         /* the ambig_info field of oper should contain the copy of oper which
01263            will be placed in the correction cb  */
01264 
01265     corr_oper = (L_Oper *) oper->ambig_info;
01266     
01267     if (corr_oper == NULL)
01268         L_punt ("L_change_ext_operand: oper does not have ext field",
01269                  L_ERR_INTERNAL);
01270 
01271     old_operand = corr_oper->src[operand_num];
01272     corr_oper->src[operand_num] = new_operand;
01273     L_delete_operand (old_operand);
01274 
01275 }
01276 
01277 static void
01278 L_free_sched_info (L_Cb *cb)
01279 {
01280     L_Oper *oper;
01281     Sched_Info *sched_info;
01282 
01283     for (oper=cb->first_op; oper!=NULL; oper=oper->next_op)
01284     {
01285         if (oper->ext!=NULL)
01286         {
01287             sched_info = SCHED_INFO(oper);
01288  
01289             /* free allocated memory to pools */
01290             L_delete_ru_info_oper(sched_info->ru_info);
01291             sched_info->ru_info = NULL;
01292 
01293             sched_info->oper = NULL;
01294             sched_info->dep_info = NULL;
01295             sched_info->mdes_info = NULL;
01296             sched_info->entry_list = NULL;
01297 
01298             if (sched_info->branch_kill_set) 
01299                 free(sched_info->branch_kill_set);
01300 
01301             sched_info->delay_sinfo = NULL;
01302             sched_info->prev_br = NULL;
01303             sched_info->post_br = NULL;
01304             sched_info->check_op = NULL;
01305             sched_info->extend_lr_down = NULL;
01306             sched_info->store_list = NULL;
01307 
01308             L_free(Operand_ready_pool, SCHED_INFO(oper)->operand_ready_times);
01309             L_free(Sched_Info_pool, oper->ext);
01310 
01311             /* Set the pointer back to null to prevent multiple freeing */
01312             oper->ext = NULL;
01313         }
01314     }
01315 }

01317 
01318 static void
01319 L_mcb_convert_to_parent(L_Cb *cb)
01320 {
01321     L_Oper *oper;
01322 
01323     for (oper = cb->first_op; oper != NULL; oper=oper->next_op) {
01324         if (oper->opc != Lop_CHECK)
01325            oper->flags = L_SET_BIT_FLAG(oper->flags, L_OPER_PARENT);
01326     }
01327 }
01328 
01329 
01330 
01331 /******************************************************************************\
01332  *
01333  * Main entry points for prepass and post pass code scheduling
01334  *
01335 \******************************************************************************/
01336 
01337 #define MCB_MIN_CB_WEIGHT 1000.0
01338 
01339 void
01340 Lsched_mcb_schedule_block(L_Func *fn, L_Cb *cb, L_Cb *nomcb_cb) 
01341 {
01342     L_Oper      *oper, *prev_br, *post_br, *next_oper;
01343     int         home_block, is_branch;
01344     double old_cycles, new_cycles;
01345 
01346             /* first decide whether this block should be MCB
01347                 scheduled, based upon execution weight. */
01348 
01349     if ( (cb->weight < MCB_MIN_CB_WEIGHT) ||
01350          (cb->first_op == NULL) ) {
01351         L_free_cb_mdes_info (cb);
01352         L_delete_dependence_graph(cb);
01353         L_free_sched_info (cb);
01354         L_mcb_convert_to_parent(cb);
01355         L_delete_all_oper (cb->first_op, 1);
01356         cb->first_op = NULL;
01357         cb->last_op = NULL;
01358         cb->src_flow = NULL;
01359         cb->dest_flow = NULL;
01360         L_free(L_alloc_cb, cb);
01361         return;
01362     }
01363 
01364     if ( Lsched_debug_messages )
01365         fprintf(stdout, "prepass MCB scheduling cb %d\n", cb->id);
01366 
01367     old_cycles = L_approx_cb_time (nomcb_cb);
01368 
01369     if ((cb->last_op) && IS_UCOND_BRANCH(cb->last_op->proc_opc) &&
01370         (!L_is_predicated(cb->last_op) || L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL(cb->flags,
01371                                                 L_CB_HYPERBLOCK_NO_FALLTHRU)))
01372         Lsched_latest_br = cb->last_op;
01373     else
01374         Lsched_latest_br = NULL;
01375 
01376         /* Build MDES information */
01377     L_build_cb_mdes_info (cb);
01378 
01379         /*  Build dependence graph */
01380     L_build_dependence_graph(cb, LDEP_PREPASS, LDEP_MODE_ACYCLIC);
01381 
01382         /* Initialize branch ptrs */
01383     prev_br = NULL;
01384     post_br = L_find_next_branch(cb, NULL);
01385 
01386         /* Build Scheduler information */
01387     Lsched_num_opers = 0;
01388     for (oper=cb->first_op,home_block=0;oper!=NULL;oper=oper->next_op) {
01389         is_branch = Lsched_is_branch(oper->proc_opc);
01390 
01391         if (is_branch)
01392             post_br = L_find_next_branch(cb, oper);
01393 
01394         if ((oper->ext==NULL) &&(!IS_IGNORE(oper->proc_opc))) {
01395             Lsched_num_opers++;
01396             oper->ext = (Sched_Info *)
01397                 L_create_sched_info(oper,home_block,prev_br,post_br);
01398         }
01399         else if (oper->ext!=NULL) {
01400             Lsched_num_opers++;
01401             SCHED_INFO(oper)->prev_br = prev_br;
01402             SCHED_INFO(oper)->post_br = post_br;
01403         }
01404 
01405         if (is_branch) {
01406             home_block++;
01407             prev_br = oper;
01408         }
01409     }
01410 
01411     L_mcb_insert_check_and_rem_dependences (cb);
01412 
01413         /* Code scheduling */
01414     Lsched_schedule_block(cb);
01415 
01416         /* now choose whether to use new MCB schedule or old;
01417                 only keep MCB if shorter schedule */
01418 
01419     new_cycles = L_approx_cb_time (cb);
01420 
01421     if ( ((old_cycles - new_cycles) / old_cycles) <= MIN_MCB_SPEEDUP ) {
01422 
01423             /* we will use the non-MCB schedule, so we need to delete
01424                 the MCB version of the cb */
01425 
01426         printf ("leaving cb %d in original order\n",nomcb_cb->id);
01427         L_free_cb_mdes_info (cb);
01428         L_delete_dependence_graph(cb);
01429         L_free_oper_list_cb(cb);
01430         L_free_sched_info (cb);
01431             /* as a hack, we convert all opers to parents before deleting
01432                 to prevent deletion from oper_hash_tbl.  (there are no
01433                 corresponding oper_hash_tbl entries for these mcb opers) */
01434         L_mcb_convert_to_parent(cb);
01435         L_delete_all_oper (cb->first_op, 1);
01436         for (oper = nomcb_cb->first_op; oper != NULL; oper=next_oper) {
01437             next_oper = oper->next_op;
01438             L_oper_hash_tbl_update_cb(fn->oper_hash_tbl, oper->id, nomcb_cb);
01439         }
01440         cb->first_op = NULL;
01441         cb->last_op = NULL;
01442         cb->src_flow = NULL;
01443         cb->dest_flow = NULL;
01444         L_free(L_alloc_cb, cb);
01445 
01446     }
01447     else {
01448             /* gonna use the MCB schedule; now need to add correction
01449                code, tail duplication, and Nicolau-like code for trace */
01450 
01451         printf ("using mcb sched for cb %d\n",nomcb_cb->id);
01452         L_free_cb_mdes_info (nomcb_cb);
01453         L_delete_dependence_graph(nomcb_cb);
01454         L_free_sched_info (nomcb_cb);
01455         L_delete_all_oper (nomcb_cb->first_op, 1);
01456         nomcb_cb->first_op = NULL;
01457         nomcb_cb->last_op = NULL;
01458         for (oper = cb->first_op; oper != NULL; oper=next_oper) {
01459             next_oper = oper->next_op;
01460             if (SCHED_INFO(oper) != NULL)
01461                 L_delete_all_oper_list (SCHED_INFO(oper)->store_list);
01462             if (oper->opc != Lop_CHECK)
01463                 L_oper_hash_tbl_insert(fn->oper_hash_tbl, oper);
01464             L_insert_oper_after (nomcb_cb, nomcb_cb->last_op, oper);
01465         }
01466         cb->first_op = NULL;
01467         cb->last_op = NULL;
01468         cb->src_flow = NULL;
01469         cb->dest_flow = NULL;
01470         L_free(L_alloc_cb, cb);
01471 
01472         L_insert_correction_code (nomcb_cb);
01473         L_insert_fall_thru_code (nomcb_cb);
01474 
01475 
01476     }
01477 
01478 }
01479 
01480 
01481 static void
01482 L_mcb_delete_check (L_Cb *cb, L_Oper *check, int current_time)
01483 {
01484 
01485     Sched_Info  *sched_info;
01486     Dep_Info    *dep_info;
01487     L_Dep       *dep;
01488 
01489     sched_info = SCHED_INFO(check);
01490     dep_info = DEP_INFO(check);
01491 
01492     /* Remove check from its queued list */
01493     if (L_in_queue(scheduled_queue, sched_info) )
01494        L_punt("L_mcb_delete_check: Deleting check that has been scheduled");
01495 
01496     L_dequeue_from_all (sched_info);
01497 /*
01498     Lsched_remove_list(sched_info->current_list, check);
01499 */
01500    
01501     /* Remove all input dependences */
01502     for (dep=dep_info->input_dep; dep!=NULL; dep=dep_info->input_dep)
01503     {
01504         Dep_Info        *from_dep_info=DEP_INFO(dep->from_oper);
01505         int             type=dep->type;
01506 
01507         dep_info->input_dep = L_remove_dep(dep_info->input_dep,
01508             &dep_info->n_input_dep, type, dep->from_oper, check);
01509 
01510         from_dep_info->output_dep = L_remove_dep(from_dep_info->output_dep,
01511             &from_dep_info->n_output_dep, type, dep->from_oper, check);
01512     }
01513 
01514     /*
01515      * make_ready will physically remove the dependence as well place 
01516         the instruction in the pending_ready list if the instruction 
01517         is ready to be scheduled.
01518      */
01519     sched_info->issue_slot=0;
01520     for (dep=dep_info->output_dep; dep!=NULL; dep=dep_info->output_dep)
01521     {
01522         L_Oper          *to_oper=dep->to_oper;
01523         Dep_Info        *to_dep_info=DEP_INFO(to_oper);
01524         Sched_Info      *to_sched_info=SCHED_INFO(to_oper);
01525         int             type=dep->type, prev_dep, num_dep,
01526                         to_index=dep->to_index,
01527                         from_index=dep->from_index;
01528 
01529         dep_info->output_dep = L_remove_dep(dep_info->output_dep,
01530             &dep_info->n_output_dep, type, check, to_oper);
01531 
01532         prev_dep = to_dep_info->n_input_dep;
01533 
01534         to_dep_info->input_dep = L_remove_dep(to_dep_info->input_dep,
01535             &to_dep_info->n_input_dep, type, check, to_oper);
01536 
01537         /* L_remove_dep can remove multiple dependences of a given type */
01538         num_dep = prev_dep-to_dep_info->n_input_dep;
01539         if (num_dep <= 0)
01540             L_punt("L_mcb_delete_check: dependence not removed!");
01541         else
01542             if (num_dep>1)
01543                 to_sched_info->num_depend-=(num_dep-1);
01544 
01545         /*
01546          * We must make sure that dependent instruction is correctly
01547          * moved to pending_ready list if there are no more
01548          * dependences.
01549          */
01550         Lsched_make_ready(cb, current_time, sched_info, to_sched_info, to_index,
01551             from_index, dep->distance);
01552     }
01553 
01554     /* Free up all allocated memory */
01555     L_delete_dependence_info(dep_info);
01556 /*
01557     L_delete_ru_info_oper(sched_info->ru_info);
01558 */
01559     L_free_oper_mdes_info (check);
01560     L_delete_sched_info(sched_info);
01561 
01562     if (Lsched_debug_messages)
01563        fprintf (stdout, "> deleting check op %d\n", check->id);
01564 
01565     /* Delete the check instruction */
01566     L_delete_oper(cb, check);
01567 
01568 }
01569 
01570 
01571 
01572 void
01573 L_mcb_remove_check (L_Cb *cb, L_Oper *oper, int ready_time)
01574 {
01575     L_Oper_List *store_list;
01576     int found_bypass;
01577 
01578     if (!L_general_load_opcode(oper))
01579         return;
01580 
01581     if (SCHED_INFO(oper)->check_op == NULL)
01582         return;
01583 
01584     if (Lmcb_keep_checks)
01585         return;
01586 
01587         /* check if the load has bypassed any stores on its store_list */
01588 
01589     store_list = SCHED_INFO(oper)->store_list;
01590 
01591     found_bypass = 0;
01592 
01593     while ((store_list != NULL) && (! found_bypass)) {
01594 /*
01595         if (SCHED_INFO(store_list->oper)->current_list != scheduled) {
01596 */
01597         if (! L_in_queue (scheduled_queue, SCHED_INFO(store_list->oper))) {
01598 
01599                 /* the store hasn't been scheduled yet, so load has bypassed
01600                         it; need to keep check */
01601             found_bypass = 1;
01602         }
01603         else
01604             store_list = store_list->next_list;
01605     }
01606 
01607 /*
01608     if (found_bypass) {
01609         oper->attr = L_concat_attr(oper->attr,L_new_attr("MCB",0));
01610     }
01611     else {
01612         L_mcb_delete_check (cb,SCHED_INFO(oper)->check_op,ready_time);
01613         SCHED_INFO(oper)->check_op = NULL;
01614     }
01615 */
01616     if (! found_bypass) {
01617         L_mcb_delete_check (cb,SCHED_INFO(oper)->check_op,ready_time);
01618         SCHED_INFO(oper)->check_op = NULL;
01619     }
01620 
01621 
01622 }
